channel.title: Join us on freiheit.com
channel.description: Recent content in Join us on freiheit.com

item.title: Our Community
item.description: Our Community. In our Engineering Hubs in Hamburg and Lisbon you will meet people from all over the world, different cultures, colors, languages, genders and lifestyles. We celebrate diversity and openness. When you ask anybody why they are working here, it is pretty likely that people will say “because of the people” and “because I have never learnt so much in my life”. Our company is a place to be yourself, aim high, taking care of each other and growing without limits.

item.title: 85 % of our people are engineers.
item.description: 85 % of Our People Are Engineers. At heart we are an unusual, innovative and bold engineering company. 85 % of our people are engineers with backgrounds in computer science, physics or mathematics, many also with strong machine learning backgrounds. 85 % of our people are engineers with backgrounds in computer science, physics or mathematics, many also with strong machine learning backgrounds.
